problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD是菱形,两对角线的长分别为AC=26cm,BD=10cm,菱形ABCD的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is a rhombus, and the lengths of the two diagonals are AC = N_0, BD = N_1, and the area of ​​the diamond ABCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是菱形,两对角线的长分别为AC=26cm,BD=10cm,∴菱形ABCD的面积是:\frac{1}{2}AC•BD=\frac{1}{2}×26×10=130(cm²)．故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题考查了菱形的性质．此题难度不大,注意掌握数形结合思想的应用．
